ygData.subject: Re: Armor of PvP
ygData.msgSnippet: Its really hard to say what they might do on the PvP server though.  For example, you can buy the level 24 Magician spells on PvP server but you can t buy them
ygData.messageBody:
Its really hard to say what they might do on the PvP server though. For
example, you can buy the level 24 Magician spells on PvP server but you
can't buy them on any other server. But this could just be another example
of lack up bug fixes also. : )

Mark

Amazing $14,000 Opportunity. Click below for details.
http://www.9898.com/mreed


> From: Nick Emmerich <seorin@...>
>
> no, PvP server doesn't always get as many bug fixes etc. that we do (ie.
recent
> guild bug), let alone new features. If it's on a server, it's the test
server,
> but I doubt it's even there :( The last thing they put there for trade
skills
> was dough, and that's the only thing they did to the skills besides nerf
> brewing. I don't think they'll be implementing a full set of armor to be
made by
> smiths as an unannounced change like they did with dough. Of course, I
could be
> entirely wrong =P
> -Rennin of E'Ci
> Trade Council GM
>
> kale usi wrote:
>
> > From: "kale usi" <kaleusi@...>
> >
> > >From: "Edw. B. Barganier" <edw@...>
> > >
> > >Aye, Plate is available in shops. Ye jus can nae make it yerself >yet.
> >
> > I should have been clearer (mistake on my part). I meant to ask if plate
was
> > available by smithing it. If not, any ideas as to when/if it will be
> > implemented? I've heard rumors of it being implemented on the PvP server
> > (can't verify).
